summary: Fixed two bugs: 1) Changed theme.min.js loading from dynamic appendChild (which doesn't guarantee execution order) to a safer approach using script element with async=false and defer=false, appended to head instead of body. Added proper error handling and jQuery availability checks to prevent race conditions. 2) Fixed sidebar help link active state check from 'backoffice/beautybooking/help*' to 'admin/beautybooking/help*' to match the actual route path registered via RouteServiceProvider with 'admin' prefix.
current_status: Both bugs fixed. Theme.min.js now loads with proper jQuery dependency checking and synchronous-like execution order. Sidebar help link will now correctly show active state when viewing help pages at /admin/beautybooking/help/*.
